long_description: This heavy-duty luggage tray easily attaches to your Yakima rack (sold separately) to hold luggage, packs, coolers and lots of other gear. Durable vinyl-coated steel wire grid has a two-inch lip for corralling gear with the Yakima Stretch Net, sold separately. Spans the width of your car so you can load from either side; or mount lengthwise to allow room on crossbars for bikes or other gear. Compatible with Yakima and Thule bars using included hardware; fits on factory racks with use of Yakima MightyMounts, sold separately. Requires a minimum crossbar spread of 12 inches. All mounting hardware included.
short_description: This heavy-duty luggage tray easily attaches to your Yakima rack (sold separately) to hold luggage, packs, coolers and lots of other gear.
